description.en: ARWU ranks world universities by academic and research performance indicators including Nobel Prizes, Fields Medals, highly cited researchers, and publications in Nature and Science. More than 2500 universities are ranked annually with the top 1000 published.
description.zh: ARWU通过学术和研究绩效指标对世界大学进行排名，包括诺贝尔奖、菲尔兹奖、高被引研究者以及在Nature和Science上的发表。每年对2500多所大学进行排名，发布前1000名。

data_content.en: Alumni and staff Nobel Prizes and Fields Medals
data_content.zh: 校友和教职员工诺贝尔奖和菲尔兹奖获得者

data_content.en: Highly Cited Researchers by Clarivate Analytics
data_content.zh: 科睿唯安高被引研究者

data_content.en: Publications in Nature and Science journals
Papers indexed in SCIE and SSCI
